alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 11:36AM AKST until February 15 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blowing snow and cold wind chills occurring. Visibility in blowing snow reducing visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. In addition strong winds combined with cold temperatures are producing wind chill values of 35 to 50 below. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until noon Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong northeasterly winds combined with recent snowfall are producing low visibilities in blowing snow as low as one quarter mile at times. In addition cold temperatures combined with the wind are producing wind chill values 35 to 50 below. Conditions will improve Tuesday morning as winds diminish. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
